titles.title: BUILDS Act
Better Utilizing Innovative Low-emission Development Strategies Act
BUILDS Act
A bill to amend the Energy Independence and Security Act of 2007 to require the Secretary of Transportation to develop and carry out a program to improve energy efficiency in transportation.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.

term.name: Hybrid, electric, and advanced technology vehicles

bill.summary:
Better Utilizing Innovative Low-emission Development Strategies Act or the BUILDS Act
This bill directs the Department of Transportation to establish a grant program to promote reductions in transportation energy use, accelerate the adoption of new and existing energy efficient technologies for transportation applications, and enhance transportation infrastructure.
